manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FORMULATED TO ENHANCE THE HAIR STRENGTH AND COLOR L'ANZA's UNIQUE FORMULA Formulated with essential nutrients, this range of L'ANZA premium products is designed to free your hair from radical damage, prevent future split ends, and keep hair and scalp feeling and looking beautiful every day. HEAL AND REPAIR BLEACH DAMAGE Whether you’re coloring your hair yourself or using the services of a professional, your hair might look fried and frizzy due to the layers of chemicals that lock in moisture and dehydrate your hair. This miracle haircare range from L'ANZA will reinforce your hair and help nourish it from roots to ends. Say goodbye to frizzy, dull, and dehydrated hair, now and forever! GET YOUR LUSTER BACK Get your brilliant shine and smoothness back with the L'ANZA Healing Colorecare line. Thanks to the wild natural nourishment your hair will look silky smooth, full of color and life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars and I loved it. Since I don't color my hair
reviews.reviewText: I don't color my hair, and it's not dry, either. It's a little bit frizzy, though. I had been using Matrix Biolage Hydrating Shampoo and Matrix Biolage Detangling Solution for years. A friend told me I should try her L'anza Color Preserving Shampoo & Conditioner, and I loved it. Since I don't color my hair, I bought the regular L'anza shampoo & conditioner. It didn't work as well, though, so I bought the Color Preserving shampoo & conditioner and have been using it for a year and half. Additionally, I started using a small amount of L'anza Keratin Healing Oil massaged into my wet hair after every shower, and it worked wonderfully. After using that for about a year, I decided to look at L'anza's other products and bought some L'anza Healing Strength Neem Plant Silk Serum - it's supposed to be for "aging hair," and I'm in my fifties. I like it even better. Both of them detangle my hair, make it shinier and healthier, and don't make my hair oily at all. I shampoo my hair every other day or once in a while every third day, and it's never even slightly oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never expected to use a colored tint on my silver hair!
reviews.reviewText: My son-in-law, who retired this year gave me the remainder of his supply of La’anza shampoo and conditioner from his (now closed) hair salon. As soon as I began using it, I started to get compliments from staff and residents in my Assisted Living facility. And the compliments continue as I continue to use the products. The shampoo and conditioner give my silver hair definition and style. Visiting entertainers and guests notice my hair and the compliments continue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry hair!
reviews.reviewText: This is excellent for restoring body to hair, it’s not good for volume at all. Careful of that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Stuff Really Works!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this shampoo and conditioner. It leaves my colored, fine hair, shiny, soft and not weighted down. It actually feels fuller. It has a lovely, light fragrance which I love. This shampoo and conditioner are my new best friends. I use a variety of natural shampoo & conditioners but I keep coming back to the Lanza. It is my favorite and worth the price. I have not been paid for this review and is my honest opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BAD GIRL, GOOD HAIR!
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo and conditioner is AMAZING!! I have never actually had soft hair after it's been bleached. Super glad I splurged. Posting this on the conditioner, shampoo, silver care shampoo and hair oil products. I use the silver care once or twice a week, and the regular shampoo 2-3x a week (I only wash hair every other day). Conditioner every time I get my hair wet. I use the oil on dry hair usually but sometimes damp. The whole routine was suggested by my hair stylist at Tiana’s Hair Salon in Albuquerque, NM. That girl is amazing at her job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love shampoo. Packaging was horrible.
reviews.reviewText: Shampoo/conditioner is very good for my naturally curly, coarse hair. Packaging horrible. Pump top was loose with shampoo all over interior of box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is amazing conditioner !!
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff !! Smells fantastic, keeps my hair soft and…. Hold the color in my hair ! This is the best I’ve used !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Started using these hair products about a year ago. My hair has not looked healthier or more shiny.
E stato ordinato per la mia compagna insieme allo shampoo, sono deo prodotti che li usa ormai più di un anno ed e molto soddisfatta della qualità dopo aver provato altri brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: L’anza is my favourite brand for hair products. I have been using their conditioner, shampoo and treatments for years and I am still amazed by the result. Hair stays hydrated, it smell good for days and you will have to wash it less often than with other products.
Habe die Spülung von meinem Frisör empfohlen bekommen, der meinte es mache mein Haar seidig glänzend. Entspricht absolut der Wahrheit und ich bin total begeistert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best range on the market! This bottle usually lasts me around 14 months and i use it 2/3 times a week!It leaves your hair soft and so manageable with a beautiful lustrous shine!
